title: glib 2.42.1 not building correctly on CrayXC-SuSE11
body:
I am having a hard time building glib on Cray systems. Spack builds it just fine on RHEL and Mac OS. It seems to be hitting a snag in `/usr/bin/dtrace`. I wonder if this is just a faulty dtrace that is provided with SuSE? Has anyone else run into this?

Relevant errors:

```
make[2]: Entering directory `/tmp/frenchrd/spack-stage/spack-stage-8szQIo/glib-2.42.1/glib'
  GEN      glibconfig-stamp
  GEN      glib_probes.lo
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/dtrace", line 281, in <module>
    main()
  File "/usr/bin/dtrace", line 268, in main
    filename + ".o"], shell=False)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/subprocess.py", line 470, in call
    return Popen(*popenargs, **kwargs).wait()
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/subprocess.py", line 623, in __init__
    errread, errwrite)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/subprocess.py", line 1141, in _execute_child
    raise child_exception
OSError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory
make[2]: *** [glib_probes.lo] Error 1
```
